## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                   | Type     | Default     |
| -------------- | --------------- | ----------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `bgColor`      | `bg-color`      | The button's background color | `string` | `undefined` |
| `borderRadius` | `border-radius` | The button's border radius    | `string` | `undefined` |
| `message`      | `message`       | The message                   | `string` | `undefined` |
| `padding`      | `padding`       | The button's padding          | `string` | `undefined` |
| `txtColor`     | `txt-color`     | The button's text color       | `string` | `undefined` |
| `width`        | `width`         | The button's width            | `string` | `undefined` |
